Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
RAG Chatbot Integration: Complete Implementation

Integrated a Retrieval-Augmented Generation \(RAG\) chatbot within the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics book. The implementation includes:

- FastAPI backend server with endpoints for chat, document listing, and search
- Qdrant vector database for semantic search using sentence transformers
- React frontend component with user-selected text functionality
- Automatic loading of book content from docs/ directory
- Docusaurus integration with embedded chatbot on book pages
- Support for context-aware responses based on selected text
- Source attribution and confidence scoring for responses

The system uses free tools as required: FastAPI, Qdrant Cloud Free Tier \(with local option\), Sentence Transformers, and React.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Implement Authentication and Personalization System

Added comprehensive user authentication and personalization system with:

- Multi-step signup form with background questions about user experience, interests, and goals
- Signin functionality with user session management
- User profile storage with background information
- Personalization engine that customizes content based on user profiles
- Enhanced RAG chatbot that considers user context for personalized responses
- Content ranking based on user interests
- Response complexity adjustment based on experience level
- Personalized recommendations and learning paths
- User dashboard with profile summary and recommendations
- Proper integration with Docusaurus theme system
- Complete documentation for the authentication system

The system collects user background during signup including experience level, 
programming skills, robotics interests, learning goals, and hardware access,
then uses this information to deliver personalized content and chat responses.
